projects.title: AgroIntel Pro
projects.description: AgroIntel Pro is a Smart Farming Mobile Application is a cutting-edge approach to farming that leverages technology to optimize crop production while conserving resources. This project report discusses the development and implementation of a Smart Crop, Fertilizer, and Disease Predictor System.

projects.title: Reno App - Restaurant Partner
projects.description: With Renoapp, restaurant owners gain access to a comprehensive suite of tools to streamline their operations and boost revenue like never before. From efficient capacity planning to dynamically priced offers, real-time booking and order management

projects.title: Shopping Hub
projects.description: ShoppingHub is a feature-rich React Native ecommerce application that provides a seamless shopping experience for users. It comes with a robust authentication system integrated with Google and Firebase, as well as versatile payment options including Stripe and UPI.

projects.title: Task Manager App
projects.description: Simple task management app for gig workers that allows users to create, update, delete, and view tasks. The app should have basic user authentication, local data storage, and an intuitive user interface.

projects.title: EazyHome - Real Eastate Website
projects.description: EazyHome is a full-stack MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) web application designed to simplify the process of browsing and booking properties.The website allows users to view available properties, book them securely, and receive project details via email

projects.title: Trends - Ecommerce platform
projects.description: Trends is a modern and user-friendly e-commerce website built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). The website allows users to explore trending products and make purchases securely using the Stripe payment system.

projects.title: Happiness Plans
projects.description: Happiness Plans is the one destination for all travel-related services. This is a ReactJS Website that shows all details of the company.

projects.title: Amazon Clone
projects.description: This Amazon-clone is a full-stack e-commerce website created using the MERN Stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js).It includes user authentication using Firebase, product ordering, and Stripe payment processing.

projects.title: Crypto Bet Game
projects.description: A backend for a crash multiplier crypto game. Players bet in USD (using BTC/ETH conversion), try to cash out before a random crash point—all provably fair, with REST and real-time Socket.IO.

projects.title: Email Campaign Scheduler
projects.description: Use of nodemailer & SMTP to send emails at the scheduled time & Lists all campaigns with status – pending, sent, or failed.

projects.title: Warehouse Management System Development
projects.description: Python application with a graphical user interface (GUI) and ReactJS website that allows users to easily map Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) to Master SKUs (MSKUs).

projects.title: VisionTrackAI
projects.description: Detect and track objects in real-time video streams from YouTube URLs, as well as static videos and images.

projects.title: CVInsight - Smart AI Resume Analyzer
projects.description: Smart AI Resume Analyzer is your all-in-one tool to analyze, optimize, and craft resumes that stand out, helping you land your dream job.

projects.title: Django Chat App
projects.description: Real time chat in group with django and websockets .

projects.title: VK_Galaxy
projects.description: Online clothing store with full features of authentication to purchase products.

projects.title: Imaginify - An AI SaaS Platform
projects.description: Built with Next.JS librarry is an AI image SaaS platform that excels in image processing capabilities, integrates a secure payment infrastructure and offers advanced image search functionalities.
